Html:
First of all, thank you for the emulator, it is amazing!

Is there a way to obtain the sci tools app on the ti 83 or 84 emulator? Thanks!
Knelli

I was able to download the scitools file from wabbitemu drive and upload it to the ti84 SE C emulator. However, when I select it from the apps, the screen goes blank and the emulator locks up. Any suggestions?
Thanks!

Hi Knelli,

I'm guessing you used the old version of the SciTools apps, intended for non color editions. These are not compatible with the color version, however there is a bug with Wabbitemu that allows you to load them anyway. The fix is easy:
  1. Download the correct version here: http://education.ti.com/en/us/software/details/en/9D3F4BCE82714C8591DD2F808CFCACDE/84c-science-tools-app
  2. Open wabbitemu
  3. If you're still stuck on the blank screen, you can do a Debug->Reset Calculator
  4. Load the latest version you downloaded
This should allow you to use SciTools, just like you do on the normal calc.

Let me know if you have anymore questions or issues,
BuckeyeDude
